Send messages as group conversations by default

"All messages are billed per recipient at your plan's standard rates.
"Group conversation(Reply all):" Like email, all recipients with compatible phones can see everyone on the \"To\" list and reply to everyone. Sent as multimedia messages.
"Individual messages" Like an email \"Bcc\" list, recipients can't see anyone on the list and can only reply to you. Sent as text messages."
Not all contacts will have the capability to participate in a group conversation, however all contacts will be able to receive and respond to your messages.
Welcome to Samsung! Your device is now registered
Call contact whose log details, contact details, or message details are currently on screen when the device is brought near the face

The existing attachments for the message will be discarded. Do you want to continue?
The location attachment for the message will be discarded. Do you want to continue?

"Share your: 1. Current location 2. Saved location 3. A place of interest
By attaching it to your message. Location messages are billed as multimedia messages.
When searching for places on the map, data usage is billed according to your plan.
By using location messaging you consent to the collection and use of information regarding the location of this phone and disclosure of location information to third parties in order to deliver these location based services. There is no representation, warranty or guarantee of reliability or of accuracy, completeness, or timeliness of any data by using this location based service.
Certain software or technical information is provided by and licensed from third parties including Telecommunications Systems, Inc., which may be covered by one or more U.S. Patent; and pending U.S. Patent Apps, as well as pending counterpart European and international patents."
